title: Diary of Warnings Revealed
outcome: A central square's malfunctioning display begins broadcasting handwritten diary entries—soon identified as Halden's. Each cryptic entry predicts city events before they happen, driving citizens to gather and decode warnings. While some see hope in the messages, others panic, believing Halden left hidden signals or threats. Public trust fractures as BCI malfunctions multiply and spontaneous assemblies threaten to turn violent.

events.description: A central square display malfunctions, streaming handwritten notes from Halden's long-lost dream diary. The cryptic messages eerily foreshadow daily city events.
Crowds gather daily to decode and debate the messages—some see them as warnings, others as codes for resistance or hidden threats.
A sequence of diary entries leads to a coordinated protest, with citizens convinced Halden left instructions to challenge the Council’s legitimacy.
Unrest intensifies as BCI scores drop irregularly for all protest participants. Systematic fear spreads—are the diary messages a trap, or salvation?
Council emergency session debates destroying the original diary display and restricting analog communication as panic threatens to tip into mass violence.
